explains: n. 圆柱体，圆筒；汽缸；高压钢瓶；印刷机滚筒；（枪的）旋转弹膛；筒形石印；柱面
wordGroup: hydraulic cylinder 液压缸；液缸；油唧
cylinder block 气缸体；气缸柱；气缸座
air cylinder 汽缸；储气筒；空气气缸
cylinder pressure 液压缸压力；汽缸压力
gas cylinder 煤气罐；气体钢筒；高压气瓶
pressure cylinder 增压缸；压力缸
actuating cylinder 作动筒；主动油缸；制动气缸
master cylinder 主缸；制动缸；控制缸

sentences.en: The cylinder is cooled by a jet of water.
The car was powered by a four cylinder air-cooled engine.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车是由一个四缸气冷式发动机驱动的。

sentences.en: The steam was condensed rapidly by injecting cold water into the cylinder.
sentences.cn: 由于汽缸中注入了冷水，蒸汽迅速凝结了。
